title: The Faces of Ixchel
description: Oxford academic Stephen Anderson’s cosy world is shattered when a research trip investigating Mayan inscriptions catapults him into a deadly confrontation with the shadowy Eye, a militant force working with scientists in Guatemala. Uncovering an ancient trail of clues through the rainforest and into underwater temples brings him and his friend Dr April Teel into contact with the fabled Faces of Ixchel and their mind-expanding powers that threaten the reality of anyone who comes into contact with them. Can Stephen survive his encounter with the militant forces of the Eye, who are willing to kill the academic and everyone around him to seize the legendary Faces of Ixchel?If you like supernatural thrillers with compelling prose, then you’ll love this incredible journey. Lee Dorsett has been teaching English in various countries for a decade. The Faces of Ixchel is his first novel. Visit the author online at www.leedorsett.com
author: Lee Dorsett
